context.summary: LinkedIn conversation with Florian who is struggling with technical hiring - finding it more difficult than expected to find the right people for his company. Alexis asked him to forward something (appears to be a document/image) and checked in about how things are going with the company.

pendingActions.action: Florian to forward document when received

recentMessages.text:
Unfortunately didn't get it so far - will forward once I receive it.

Regarding company: Currently I spend most time to hire new technical talents - more difficult than expected to find the right people 

What about you?
How's things going? In the company?
Did you get this? Can you forward?
